The claim was flagged by Facebook as par: 2. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) have confirmed two cases of COVID-19 in Hillsborough and Manatee counties in Florida, but there is no confirmation of any cases at Shands Hospital in Gainesville.
A member of UF Health: s communications team responded directly to the Facebook post, stating that there are no cases of the 2019 novel coronavirus at Shands Hospital to date.
The expert: s verdict rates the Facebook post as False, indicating that the claim of Shands Hospital confirming its first case of coronavirus is not authentic.
